New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit the fastest pitch recorded in MLB history (190 mph)
Ohtani's 47th home run of the season broke his own personal record
Ohtani's 10 runs batted in (RBI) was a new season high for him
Key Match Events: Ohtani's solo home run in the first inning
Ohtani's triple in the second inning followed by a walk
Ohtani's two-run single in the third inning
The Dodgers scored five runs in the fourth inning with four home runs
Pre-Game Insights: The game was expected to be a close match between the two rival teams
The showdown between Clayton Kershaw and Mookie Betts was highly anticipated
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers' victory was a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles
Others: The Dodgers improved to 87-59 and maintained their first place position in the National League West division
